description:
LinkedIn is a powerful business marketing tool … as long as its set up and used correctly. Business is all about building strong relationships with your target market to gain their trust in your products and services on offer. Used properly, LinkedIn will take you directly to decision makers, by-passing their 'gate-keepers'. And …. LinkedIn is perfect for people who don't like to sell!

No matter where you are in your business career, this course is for you.

Created by an experienced marketer with multiple offline and online marketing and selling courses, this course will show you how to .....

  • create your LinkedInTM account with correct settings
  • create your perfect clickworthy profile
  • build your solid network of qualified connections
  • build trustworthy relationships with your connections
  • join and interact with relevant groups and create your own group
  • set up your company page
  • profitably market your products and services using LinkedInTM
  • … and much, much more!
In addition to the step-by-step videos illustrating every step of the process, you will receive .....

Transcripts and Audio of each lecture

Tips, Scripts and a Checklist for assistance

The Method for my success

Questions: Answer YOUR questions to this course content - by ME, personally

So now I present you with a choice. You know that choosing the best social media marketing channel to use can be overwhelming. So through door # 1, you stay as you are …. stressing to achieve monthly targets and being frustrated that you're not living the lifestyle you want. … or door #2, you take this course, set yourself up correctly on LinkedIn, use LinkedIn properly and achieve your monthly sales targets with ease and have a lot more free time to do what you want with your life. The choice is yours!

I look forward to helping you create a professional LinkedIn Profile to achieve your targets and enjoy becoming a super business owner ahead of the pack.

Your Success is My Success!
title: Modern Marketing Using LinkedIn
